trapomino

Class Grid

  • java.lang.Object
    • trapomino.Grid

  • public class Grid
extends java.lang.Object
    This class will contain and manage all blocks in the grid, including Animals and Tetrominos. This class also checks if the requirements needed to make a cage around an Animal have been met.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Grid.SHAPE
      This enum contains all of the shapes that can possibly be in the grid.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Grid()
      This constructor defines the Grid, the sprites, and the shapes.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Grid

        public Grid()
        This constructor defines the Grid, the sprites, and the shapes.

    • Method Detail

      • setGridLoc

        public static void setGridLoc(Grid.SHAPE item,
                              int x,
                              int y)
        This method sets the (x,y) Position in the grid to the given shape.
        Parameters:
        item - - the shape to set at the given Position in the Grid
        x - - the X coordinate in the Grid to alter
        y - - the Y coordinate in the Grid to alter

      • unionCreate

        public static void unionCreate()
        This method creates the UnionMap that will be used to check if a cage has been created. The method will then check if the Positions surrounding each Position in the Grid contain Tetrominos If any two adjacent positions both contain Tetrominos, they will be united in the map.

      • inGrid

        public static boolean inGrid(Position pos)
        This method checks if the given Position is contained within the Grid.
        Parameters:
        pos - - the position to check
        Returns:
        true if the Position is in the Grid, false otherwise

      • similar

        public static boolean similar(Position pos1,
                              Position pos2)
        This method checks if the two given Positions have the same shape. Two Positions occupied by Tetrominos will have the same shape.
        Parameters:
        pos1 - - the first position to check for similarity
        pos2 - - the second position to check for similarity
        Returns:
        true if the Positions contain similar shapes, false otherwise

      • findTrap

        public static boolean findTrap(Position pos)
        This method checks if the Animal at the given Position has been trapped.
        Parameters:
        pos - - the Position at which to check for a trap at.
        Returns:
        true if the Position is trapped, false otherwise

      • topEmpty

        public boolean topEmpty()
        This method checks if the top row of the Grid is empty to see if the player has lost.
        Returns:
        true if the top row is empty, false if it has at least one occupied Position

      • clearRows

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> clearRows()
        This method removes the rows that are completely filled, and moves the other rows down to the next empty Position. This method then adds the rows that were cleared to an ArrayList and returns that ArrayList.
        Returns:
        an ArrayList that contains the cleared rows

      • rowCheck

        public boolean rowCheck(int y)
        This method checks if a row has been completely filled with shapes and returns true if it is filled.
        Parameters:
        y - - the Y coordinate of the row to check
        Returns:
        true if the row is filled or false if one or more Positions is empty

      • moveDownAndClear

        public void moveDownAndClear(int row)
        This method clears the row at the given Y coordinate and moves the rows above it down.
        Parameters:
        row - - the Y coordinate of the row to clear

      • changeToTrapped

        public void changeToTrapped(Position pos)
        This method stores the id of a trapped location in the UnionMap and checks every Position in the grid to see if its UnionMap value matches. If the checked Position matches and is therefore trapped, it replaces the shape with its trapped equivalent.
        Parameters:
        pos - - a trapped Position

      • render

        public void render(java.awt.Graphics window)
        This method renders the Grid and the blocks it contains onto the frame.
        Parameters:
        window - - the Graphics class to render with
